import React from 'react' import { getUser, getToken } from "../../services/auth" class PostCard extends React.Component { constructor(){ super() this.handleDownload = this.handleDownload.bind(this) } handleDownload(postId){ console.log('foi') fetch("http://gerarme-api.test/api/post/download/"+postId, { method: 'GET', headers: { 'Authorization': 'Bearer' + getToken() } }) .then(response => {return response}) } render(){ const image_url = "http://my.gerar.me/storage/app/images/Posts/Feed-12-1-20190726033853.png" //"http://gerarme.test/storage/app/images/Posts/"+this.props.post.image_url return (
  • {this.props.post.headline}
